mapper.select: SELECT "m_calendar_id", "member_num", "date", "memo" FROM membercalendar WHERE "member_num" = #{ member_num} ORDER BY "m_calendar_id" desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membercalendar ("m_calendar_id", "member_num", "date", "memo") VALUES (mcalendarid_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ member_num}, TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{ memo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (SELECT "member_num", "m_calendar_id" FROM membercalendar WHERE "member_num" = #{member_num}) WHERE "m_calendar_id" = #{m_calendar_id}
